visual.name: ClusterMap
visual.description: This visual is currently in beta testing and is undergoing active development. Cluster Map displays labeled groups of related documents using image mosaics. Clusters can be arranged in a “spiral” layout around a dominant cluster or in a “relational” layout in which clusters are arranged by degree of relatedness.  Click a cluster to invoke highlighting in linked visuals, or invoke highlighting from a linked visual to see the proportion of documents in each cluster that match the highlight criteria. Cluster Map is designed for use with Facet Key and Strippet Browser.
